00014 #ifndef dmmH
00015 #define dmmH
00016 //---------------------------------------------------------------------------
00017 #include <primarydriver.h>
00018 #include <xnodeconnector.h>
00019 
00020 class XScalarEntry;
00021 class QMainWindow;
00022 class Ui_FrmDMM;
00023 typedef QForm<QMainWindow, Ui_FrmDMM> FrmDMM;
00024 
00025 class XDMM : public XPrimaryDriver
00026 {
00027     XNODE_OBJECT
00028 protected:
00029     XDMM(const char *name, bool runtime,
00030          const shared_ptr<XScalarEntryList> &scalarentries,
00031          const shared_ptr<XInterfaceList> &interfaces,
00032          const shared_ptr<XThermometerList> &thermometers,
00033          const shared_ptr<XDriverList> &drivers);
00034 public:
00035     //! usually nothing to do
00036     virtual ~XDMM() {}
00037     //! show all forms belonging to driver
00038     virtual void showForms();
00039     
00040     double valueRecorded() const {return m_value;}
00041 protected:
00042     //! Start up your threads, connect GUI, and activate signals
00043     virtual void start();
00044     //! Shut down your threads, unconnect GUI, and deactivate signals
00045     //! this may be called even if driver has already stopped.
00046     virtual void stop();
00047   
00048     //! this is called when raw is written 
00049     //! unless dependency is broken
00050     //! convert raw to record
00051     virtual void analyzeRaw() throw (XRecordError&);
00052     //! this is called after analyze() or analyzeRaw()
00053     //! record is readLocked
00054     virtual void visualize();
00055   
00056     //! driver specific part below
00057     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> &function() const {return m_function;}
00058     const shared_ptr<XUIntNode> &waitInms() const {return m_waitInms;}
00059 protected:
00060     //! one-shot reading
00061     virtual double oneShotRead() = 0; 
00062     //! called when m_function is changed
00063     virtual void changeFunction() = 0;
00064   
00065     //! This should not cause an exception.
00066     virtual void afterStop() = 0;
00067 private:
00068     //! called when m_function is changed
00069     void onFunctionChanged(const shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> &node);
00070   
00071     const shared_ptr<XScalarEntry> m_entry;
00072     const shared_ptr<XComboNode> m_function;
00073     const shared_ptr<XUIntNode> m_waitInms;
00074     shared_ptr<XListener> m_lsnOnFunctionChanged;
00075     xqcon_ptr m_conFunction, m_conWaitInms;
00076  
00077     shared_ptr<XThread<XDMM> > m_thread;
00078     const qshared_ptr<FrmDMM> m_form;
00079     double m_value;
00080   
00081     void *execute(const atomic<bool> &);
00082   
00083 };
00084 
00085 #endif
